verses.verse: And Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his stead, and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8691><s%> himself against Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And he placed <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> forces <S%H2428><s%> in all the fenced <S%H1219><s%> <S%H8803><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> garrisons <S%H5333><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, which Asa <S%H609><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> was with Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%>, because he walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, and sought <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not unto Baalim <S%H1168><s%>;

But sought <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the YY 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, and walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, and not after the doings <S%H4639><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Therefore the YY <S%H3068><s%> stablished <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>; and all Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> brought <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> presents <S%H4503><s%>; and he had riches <S%H6239><s%> and honour <S%H3519><s%> in abundance <S%H7230><s%>.

And his heart <S%H3820><s%> was lifted up <S%H1361><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>: moreover he took away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the high places <S%H1116><s%> and groves <S%H842><s%> out of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>.

Also in the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> he sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to his princes <S%H8269><s%>, even to Benhail <S%H1134><s%>, and to `Ovadyah-yahu <S%H5662><s%>, and to Z'kharyah-yahu <S%H2148><s%>, and to Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%>, and to Michaiah <S%H4322><s%>, to teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8763><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>.

And with them he sent L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>, even Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Nethaniah <S%H5418><s%>, and Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%>, and Asahel <S%H6214><s%>, and Shemiramoth <S%H8070><s%>, and Jehonathan <S%H3083><s%>, and AdoniYAH <S%H138><s%>, and TobiYAH <S%H2900><s%>, and TobadoniYAH <S%H2899><s%>, L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>; and with them Elishama <S%H476><s%> and Yoram <S%H3088><s%>, Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>.

And they taught <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and had the book <S%H5612><s%> of the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> with them, and went about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> throughout all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and taught <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the fear <S%H6343><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> fell upon all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the lands <S%H776><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, so that they made no war <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8738><s%> against Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%>.

Also some of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8688><s%> Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> presents <S%H4503><s%>, and tribute <S%H4853><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%>; and the Arabians <S%H6163><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8688><s%> him flocks <S%H6629><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> he goats <S%H8495><s%>.

And Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> waxed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> great <S%H1432><s%> exceedingly <S%H4605><s%>; and he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> castles <S%H1003><s%>, and cities <S%H5892><s%> of store <S%H4543><s%>.

And he had much <S%H7227><s%> business <S%H4399><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>: and the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>, were in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

And these are the numbers <S%H6486><s%> of them according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>: Of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%>; Adnah <S%H5734><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%>, and with him mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.
And next <S%H3027><s%> to him was Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%> the captain <S%H8269><s%>, and with him two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fourscore <S%H8084><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

And next <S%H3027><s%> him was Amasiah <S%H6007><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri <S%H2147><s%>, who willingly offered <S%H5068><s%> <S%H8693><s%> himself unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and with him two hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>.

And of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>; Eliada <S%H450><s%> a mighty man <S%H1368><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>, and with him armed men <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with bow <S%H7198><s%> and shield <S%H4043><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

And next <S%H3027><s%> him was Jehozabad <S%H3075><s%>, and with him an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fourscore <S%H8084><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> ready prepared <S%H2502><s%> <S%H8803><s%> for the war <S%H6635><s%>.

These waited <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8764><s%> on the king <S%H4428><s%>, beside those whom the king <S%H4428><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> throughout all Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>.
